name: Tree (itch) (OneLimeStudio)
description:
An open world Game...

Explore wherever you want..Do what you want most importantly Enjoy

Controls:

W,A,S,D to move..

mouse to look

esc to quit

Disclaimer:

This is a prototype and is not polished at all rather I would say that nothing is excellent and is my first 3d game with terrain generation .

This was supposed to be a hunting game but i was not sure even if the idea made any sense so I posted this so called PROTOTYPE so that you  could give me feedback on the core mechanics . If you like my idea and played the game even for a single valuable minute of your life then in the comments post a :|

and if not then post a  :/

In next versions I will add animals

Thankyou ...
